title: How to reinstall Grammarly for Android
content:
You may be able to solve a problem by reinstalling Grammarly for Android, but be aware that doing so will cause you to lose Drafts. (See note below.)
To reinstall Grammarly for Android, follow the steps below:
Uninstall your current version of the Grammarly app.
Search for
Grammarly
in the Google Play Store.
Tap
Install
next to the
Grammarly for Android
listing to start the installation.
Once itâ€™s installed, follow the onscreen instructions to complete the setup process.
Note:
When you reinstall Grammarly for Android, all notes in your Drafts will be deleted. If you have any important information stored in Drafts, please make sure to copy it to a safe location before reinstalling the application.
